pkgmetadata.longdescription: ``quilt`` is a command-line utility that builds, pushes, and installs data packages. A `data package <https://blog.quiltdata.com/data-packages-for-fast-reproducible-python-analysis-c74b78015c7f>`_ is a versioned bundle of serialized data wrapped in a Python module. ``quilt`` pushes to and pulls from the package registry at quiltdata.com. Visit `quiltdata.com <https://quiltdata.com>`_ for docs and more.
